---

**As a** [role]
**I need** [function]
**So that** [benefit]
### Details and Assumptions
* [document what you know]

## Acceptance Criteria

```gherkin
Scenario 1: Positive Flow
Given [initial context]
When [action performed]
Then [expected outcome]

Scenario 2: Negative/Edge Case 
Given [initial context]
When [invalid/edge action]
Then [expected outcome]
```
